short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable external dashboards and projects to appear in your Trusterly meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow your favorite dashboards, reports and projects from all the popular platforms such as Salesforce, HubSpot and Monday.com to appear seamlessly in your meetings.
